t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: Amazon.com: : All Departments
s: Amazon Go is a new kind of store featuring the world’s most advanced shopping technology. No lines, no checkout – just grab and go! Watch the video: amazon.com/go

t: Amazon Go Is the Future (Plus 4 Reasons The E-Commerce Giant Might Just Win Retail)
s: February 3, 2017 - What makes Amazon Go interesting is not the concept of a grab-n-go grocery. It’s the weaving together of digital technology with the offline shopping experience to solve consumers’ biggest problems.

t: Amazon’s Blueprint For Frictionless Shopping Is The Future Of Retail
s: August 27, 2024 - Amazon developed multiple technologies to eliminate checkout lines, reduce costs and boost sales. Now, the company is offering them to competitors. Is this the future?

t: Amazon Go is Not the Future - Competitor Monitor
s: August 2, 2019 - Competitor Monitor helps you stay ahead by constantly monitoring and analysing competitor products, prices & customer reviews. TRY IT NOW · Amazon Go has been hailed as the “future” of retail, but questions have been raised about its viability - technologically, financially and ethically.

t: Amazon Go Grocery: This Is The Future Of Shopping, Whether We Like It Or Not
s: February 27, 2020 - Amazon has unveiled its Amazon Go Grocery in Seattle, expanding the initial concept of a store without tills to a practically complete supermarket with sections of various types, including fresh products. Just another step in a process that, whether some like it or not, is called progress.

t: Amazon Go, the cashierless retail store of the future, has some new competition
s: November 12, 2019 - The cashierless-store concept popularized by the Amazon Go store — which Jeff Bezos' company has major plans to expand across the U.S. — allows customers to pick up all of the items they need and then simply walk out the door.

t: New ways for shoppers to follow brands on Amazon | Amazon Ads

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

t: Inside Amazon Go, a Store of the Future - The New York Times
s: January 21, 2018 - The technology inside Amazon’s new convenience store, opening Monday in downtown Seattle, enables a shopping experience like no other — including no checkout lines.
